LABEL: 0x247
STRING: I nodded deeply at Tokiwa's words.

LABEL: 0x281
STRING: There was a research room on the <SHEEP III>, which was supposed to be a cruise submarine.

LABEL: Split3
STRING: When I turned on the flashlight, I could see the door to the laboratory in the back.

LABEL: 0x43D
STRING: That's right.

LABEL: 0x455
STRING: She was doing something in there...

LABEL: 0x485
STRING: Reiri――

LABEL: 0x571
STRING: 「Tokiwa, come here for a bit.」

LABEL: 0x5AA
STRING: 「Hwaah... Yes?」

LABEL: 0x5C7
STRING: She had her guard down, and I grabbed her hand as she was taking a deep breath.

LABEL: 0x601
STRING: There was a bit of resistance.

LABEL: 0x61B
STRING: However, I pulled her along forcefully and opened the door in the back.

LABEL: 0x718
STRING: We stepped into the room.

LABEL: 0x736
STRING: Into the cramped laboratory.

LABEL: 0x750
STRING: I used my flashlight to illuminate every corner of the room,

LABEL: 0x796
STRING: leaving Tokiwa by herself, looking around the place with great interest.

LABEL: 0x7BC
STRING: 「Tokiwa, as you can see, this is the laboratory.」

LABEL: 0x85A
STRING: 「The laboratory...」

LABEL: 0x87B
STRING: 「Reiri was experimenting here with something yesterday.」

LABEL: 0x8B1
STRING: 「No, it might not have been an experiment, but... anyway.」

LABEL: 0x8EF
STRING: 「She was here for about two hours.」

LABEL: 0x91B
STRING: 「Do you have any idea what was going on in this room?」

LABEL: 0x95D
STRING: 「If you do, please tell me!」

LABEL: 0x97B
STRING: Reiri was always sneering at us, as if she had anticipated our thoughts.

LABEL: 0x9C7
STRING: What was she doing here yesterday...?

LABEL: 0xA01
STRING: It might not have made sense to me yesterday, but it may help us now.

LABEL: 0xA63
STRING: And――

LABEL: 0xA7B
STRING: Tokiwa might be able to tell.

LABEL: 0xAAB
STRING: What Reiri was doing.

LABEL: 0xACF
STRING: What she had left for us.

LABEL: 0xB69
STRING: 「Reiri-chan...」

LABEL: 0xB8E
STRING: A whisper.

LABEL: 0xBA2
STRING: Tokiwa's small voice, if you could call it that.

LABEL: 0xBE2
STRING: As I averted my eyes, pretending not to notice. A slender hand appeared before me.

LABEL: 0xC55
STRING: 「Lend me the light, please.」

LABEL: 0xC9A
STRING: I gave the flashlight to her...

LABEL: 0xCBE
STRING: wordlessly.

LABEL: 0xCE2
STRING: Tokiwa used the light she received to illuminate the laboratory table.

LABEL: 0xD1C
STRING: Multiple laboratory instruments had been discarded on top of the white platform.

LABEL: 0xD52
STRING: Of course, someone had already searched this place, and it might have completely changed from how it was at the time of the experiment...

LABEL: 0xDBC
STRING: Tokiwa was silent.

LABEL: 0xDD8
STRING: She looked over each of the illuminated instruments.

LABEL: 0xE10
STRING: Her eyes were sharp... No, it was a bit different.

LABEL: 0xE36
STRING: Wide-open, intense eyes.

LABEL: 0xE60
STRING: She continued working in silence and eventually stopped.

LABEL: 0xE9C
STRING: 「...Did you learn anything?」

LABEL: 0xEC0
STRING: She exhaled a single breath and slowly opened her mouth.

LABEL: 0xF70
STRING: 「Cultivation... perhaps?」

LABEL: 0xF99
STRING: Tokiwa said so and turned the flashlight to several petri dishes.

LABEL: 0xFDF
STRING: Traces of the final experiment that Reiri had performed.

LABEL: 0x1079
STRING: 「Ah, don't touch them with your bare hands.」

LABEL: 0x10AE
STRING: With her saying that, I realized that I'd unconsciously reached my hand toward one.

LABEL: 0x1115
STRING: 「This is a laboratory, so there should be some kind of gloves around.」

LABEL: 0x1154
STRING: 「How methodical...」

LABEL: 0x118E
STRING: Muttering, I looked around for the gloves.

LABEL: 0x11B0
STRING: But, I had no idea where they were...

LABEL: 0x1258
STRING: 「――An experiment is a ceremony.」

LABEL: 0x127E
STRING: 「There are dangers involved in handling even the smallest of things.」

LABEL: 0x12B8
STRING: 「You must follow the proper procedure and rules.」

LABEL: 0x1307
STRING: She was one to talk.

LABEL: 0x1343
STRING: 「Oh, there they are...」

LABEL: 0x1363
STRING: A pair of disposable rubber gloves came out of a rack by the wall.

LABEL: 0x139D
STRING: I put them on right away and took the dish.

LABEL: 0x13F1
STRING: This was the last thing Reiri had left behind...

LABEL: 0x1421
STRING: I didn't know what I could learn just by looking at it.

LABEL: 0x145F
STRING: Still, I couldn't help but pick it up.

LABEL: 0x1501
STRING: 「Can you tell just by looking?」

LABEL: 0x1532
STRING: 「Isn't there a microscope somewhere?」

LABEL: 0x1568
STRING: 「If we look at this with that...」

LABEL: 0x1599
STRING: 「Unfortunately, that's also impossible because of the blackout.」

LABEL: 0x15D6
STRING: Tokiwa pointed to an electronic microscope with the flashlight.

LABEL: 0x1606
STRING: Certainly, there was nothing we could do with that without power...

LABEL: 0x1644
STRING: 「Are there no optical microscopes here?」

LABEL: 0x16D8
STRING: 「Well, there might be one somewhere...」

LABEL: 0x1715
STRING: As she spoke, she violently raised her flashlight.

LABEL: 0x1749
STRING: She illuminated the shelves that lined the walls in a circle.

LABEL: 0x17AA
STRING: 「Ah.」

LABEL: 0x17C3
STRING: She opened her mouth.

LABEL: 0x17E7
STRING: A boorish optical microscope was revealed at the other end of the light.

LABEL: 0x1827
STRING: 「Good job, Tokiwa.」

LABEL: 0x1858
STRING: 「Shall we give it a try?」

LABEL: 0x1881
STRING: While I collected the microscope, Tokiwa was steadily preparing for the experiment.

LABEL: 0x18D7
STRING: She skillfully moved the remaining liquid from the petri dish to a glass slide and finished adjusting the preparate.

LABEL: 0x193F
STRING: I held the microscope, and Tokiwa set the preparate, mirror, and lens on it.

LABEL: 0x1999
STRING: She was really good at this...

LABEL: 0x19C7
STRING: Before I had time to say anything, Tokiwa had the sample ready for observation.

LABEL: 0x1A19
STRING: 「You're pretty amazing, Tokiwa...」

LABEL: 0x1AA9
STRING: 「Not at all. Please praise me more.」

LABEL: 0x1AE6
STRING: 「I'll do that later.」

LABEL: 0x1B0D
STRING: 「Right. Then, please take a look, Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x1B68
STRING: Saying that, Tokiwa shifted her body.

LABEL: 0x1B9A
STRING: Having been given room, I leaned in closer...

LABEL: 0x1BD2
STRING: ...Feels a bit too close.

LABEL: 0x1C01
STRING: 「Haa, haa...」

LABEL: 0x1C26
STRING: I could hear her breathing in my ear.

LABEL: 0x1C52
STRING: This... wasn't good for my health.

LABEL: 0x1C7A
STRING: I shook my head and peered through the lens.

LABEL: 0x1D18
STRING: 「Could these be HeLa cells?」

LABEL: 0x1D41
STRING: 「HeLa cells...?」

LABEL: 0x1DBC
STRING: I'd heard the name somewhere before.

LABEL: 0x1E43
STRING: 「What kind of cells are those?」

LABEL: 0x1ED7
STRING: 「They're human.」

LABEL: 0x1EF3
STRING: 「HeLa cells are cancer cells taken from a certain African-American woman.」

LABEL: 0x1F37
STRING: 「That said, they're a little different from normal cancer cells.」

LABEL: 0x1F79
STRING: 「Normal human cells have lifespans.」

LABEL: 0x1FAF
STRING: 「But the cells harvested from this woman were immortal.」

LABEL: 0x1FF2
STRING: 「Immortal... cells...?」

LABEL: 0x2082
STRING: 「Since then, those cells have been exchanged between researchers.」

LABEL: 0x20C8
STRING: 「Regardless of the fact that she, the original owner of the cells, was dead.」

LABEL: 0x2120
STRING: 「Without the knowledge of the person in question or even their family, those cells went all the way to outer space.」

LABEL: 0x217A
STRING: 「These immortal cells were named "HeLa" after the woman they came from―Henrietta Lacks.」

LABEL: 0x21F0
STRING: 「HeLa cells...」

LABEL: 0x227A
STRING: 「Even now, I believe they're commonplace in biological labs.」

LABEL: 0x22DE
STRING: 「Then again, I think there are a lot of people who don't know the name Henrietta Lacks.」

LABEL: 0x2347
STRING: 「Now that you mention it, I think I remember using them in a biology experiment back in university.」

LABEL: 0x2393
STRING: I had no idea that their origin was like that.

LABEL: 0x23E1
STRING: Her own cells had been cultivated and fiddled with for decades all over the world.

LABEL: 0x2429
STRING: For science, for commerce, for politics...

LABEL: 0x245B
STRING: Even if cells didn't have a will, was that practice excusable?

LABEL: 0x24A7
STRING: Was it something forgivable?

LABEL: 0x253D
STRING: 「HeLa cells came from a human.」

LABEL: 0x2573
STRING: 「And yet, they're so different from human cells.」

LABEL: 0x25BD
STRING: 「The biggest difference is their trait of "immortality."」

LABEL: 0x25FD
STRING: 「To begin with, even the number of chromosomes is different from that of humans.」

LABEL: 0x2641
STRING: 「In which case, in terms of taxonomy, it might be a new species or a new organism...」

LABEL: 0x26F0
STRING: 「There are researchers who seriously advocate that theory.」

LABEL: 0x272F
STRING: A new immortal species of human origin...

LABEL: 0x275F
STRING: Cancer cells that had spread all over the world...

LABEL: 0x2787
STRING: What... did all of this have to do with the <SHEEP III>?

LABEL: 0x27BE
STRING: 「I wonder what Reiri was doing with these cells.」

LABEL: 0x286E
STRING: 「HeLa cells are susceptible to viruses.」

LABEL: 0x28A6
STRING: 「Reiri-chan might have been trying to make some kind of vaccine.」

LABEL: 0x2953
STRING: 「That said, this optical microscope can't see viruses, so there's no way to test it.」

LABEL: 0x29BB
STRING: 「If we can't prove it, then there's nothing we can do.」

LABEL: 0x2A0E
STRING: As if throwing away that line of thinking, Tokiwa took the flashlight that was illuminating the microscope.

LABEL: 0x2A66
STRING: As she swung it around in circles, she began to wander around the laboratory.

LABEL: 0x2AAA
STRING: I gazed at her from a distance and thought...

LABEL: 0x2B35
STRING: ――About what it was Reiri had been doing here.

LABEL: 0x2B85
STRING: Even if I thought about it, I couldn't tell.

LABEL: 0x2BAD
STRING: There was no point in standing around here.

LABEL: 0x2C3E
STRING: Tokiwa was checking out all the reagents and samples in the room.

LABEL: 0x2C8E
STRING: It might be a better idea to think about it while looking at various things like that.

LABEL: 0x2CD8
STRING: All right then, let me do that as well...

LABEL: 0x2CF6
STRING: I braced myself with both hands and stood up――

LABEL: 0x2D87
STRING: 「Whoah!」

LABEL: 0x2DA3
STRING: Instantly, I hit my lower body on something and crouched down.

LABEL: 0x2DE3
STRING: 「Owowow...」

LABEL: 0x2E01
STRING: Was that the corner of the laboratory table?

LABEL: 0x2E1F
STRING: It was good if that was all it was. If I had knocked down some dangerous solution...

LABEL: 0x2E85
STRING: That wouldn't be funny.

LABEL: 0x2EA3
STRING: It was dangerous to move about in a dark laboratory like this.

LABEL: 0x2EE3
STRING: Hmm...

LABEL: 0x2EFD
STRING: 「Tokiwa.」

LABEL: 0x2F81
STRING: 「Yes?」

LABEL: 0x2FF8
STRING: Ah,

LABEL: 0x3073
STRING: Heigh-ho?」

LABEL: 0x3090
STRING: 「Give me the flashli――」

LABEL: 0x30C9
STRING: 「I don't wanna.」

LABEL: 0x3100
STRING: An immediate answer.

LABEL: 0x3114
STRING: She could wait until I was done talking...

LABEL: 0x315C
STRING: 「Why?」

LABEL: 0x31E2
STRING: 「I have better use for it than you.」

LABEL: 0x324B
STRING: It was true that she was probably getting more use out of the thing.

LABEL: 0x32A7
STRING: But, you know...

LABEL: 0x32C7
STRING: 「I won't ask for the flashlight, then. Any other light source would be nice...」

LABEL: 0x338D
STRING: 「Light, you say?」

LABEL: 0x33B2
STRING: Tokiwa turned her flashlight.

LABEL: 0x33E0
STRING: I stared reproachfully at the beam of light illuminating the room.

LABEL: 0x3420
STRING: Tokiwa didn't notice my gaze and just let out a "Hmm-hmm," and then her eyes widened suddenly.

LABEL: 0x353F
STRING: 「Ha!」

LABEL: 0x35B7
STRING: 「I found something nice!!」

LABEL: 0x360B
STRING: Eureka... I have found it.

LABEL: 0x3661
STRING: Tokiwa gracefully shuffled between the shelves in her kimono.

LABEL: 0x36A7
STRING: Then, taking out a few solutions, she tossed them into a flask and mixed them.

LABEL: 0x3710
STRING: 「Heh heh heh.」

LABEL: 0x3735
STRING: Tokiwa hummed happily and held out the flask.

LABEL: 0x37EF
STRING: 「Please take it.」

LABEL: 0x381A
STRING: 「...What's that?」

LABEL: 0x3847
STRING: 「It's the light you were looking for.」

LABEL: 0x3877
STRING: 「Unfortunately, it has nothing to do with Akari%R(4,Light)-chan.」

LABEL: 0x38BA
STRING: Light...

LABEL: 0x38D2
STRING: But, all she was handing me was a flask.

LABEL: 0x390C
STRING: Including the liquid inside, there was no sign of any light.

LABEL: 0x3946
STRING: 「Are you joking with me...?」

LABEL: 0x39D8
STRING: 「No, no, of course not.」

LABEL: 0x3A4F
STRING: 「Now, if you would shake the flask lightly.」

LABEL: 0x3A93
STRING: 「Shake it?」

LABEL: 0x3AAD
STRING: I spun the flask around like a wine glass as instructed.

LABEL: 0x3AF7
STRING: Slowly and quietly, I spun it around.

LABEL: 0x3B1D
STRING: And when I did――

LABEL: 0x3BBB
STRING: 「――Light?」

LABEL: 0x3BD5
STRING: What... was that just now?

LABEL: 0x3BF5
STRING: Bluish-white light seemed to appear faintly for a moment...

LABEL: 0x3CBD
STRING: Again.

LABEL: 0x3CD3
STRING: The solution flickered periodically.

LABEL: 0x3CF7
STRING: It was like bioluminescent light.

LABEL: 0x3D21
STRING: This was...

LABEL: 0x3D39
STRING: 「What the hell is this?」

LABEL: 0x3D63
STRING: 「What's going on?」

LABEL: 0x3DF1
STRING: 「It's the Belousov-Zhabotinsky reaction.」

LABEL: 0x3E2C
STRING: 「...The what?」

LABEL: 0x3E59
STRING: 「Belousov-Zhabotinsky.」

LABEL: 0x3E9E
STRING: Well, whatever.

LABEL: 0x3F5A
STRING: The luminescence repeated in a simple rhythm.

LABEL: 0x3F8A
STRING: ...I thought it was beautiful.

LABEL: 0x3FAC
STRING: The bluish-white light resembled the light of a creature from the deep sea.

LABEL: 0x3FEA
STRING: It was the same with its periodic flickering.

LABEL: 0x400C
STRING: As if something living was breathing inside the flask.

LABEL: 0x40DE
STRING: I stared at the faint glow in a trance.

LABEL: 0x4118
STRING: The flickering of the light gradually slowed and calmed down.

LABEL: 0x41BC
STRING: 「Well, that's about it.」

LABEL: 0x41E8
STRING: 「What do you think?」

LABEL: 0x420D
STRING: What did I think?

LABEL: 0x4229
STRING: It was far from the light source I had wanted, but it showed me something valuable.

LABEL: 0x426D
STRING: But still, she was pretty skilled with all of this.

LABEL: 0x42A1
STRING: That's a science girl for you.

LABEL: 0x42C1
STRING: I guess she was used to experiments like this.

LABEL: 0x42E5
STRING: Come to think of it――

LABEL: 0x4301
STRING: 「Tokiwa.」

LABEL: 0x4385
STRING: 「Yes?」

LABEL: 0x43A0
STRING: 「You're the one who came up with the artificial photosynthesis technology for the <Isle of Wind>, right?」

LABEL: 0x4488
STRING: Artificial photosynthesis...

LABEL: 0x44A8
STRING: The development was led by the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology and the Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry.

LABEL: 0x44EA
STRING: The "Artificial Photosynthesis Chemical Process Technology Research Association" was an organization that had been budgeted for ten years back in 2012.

LABEL: 0x454E
STRING: The goal of the researchers was to achieve an energy conversion efficiency of over 10%% by 2030.

LABEL: 0x45BA
STRING: To begin with, even plant photosynthesis had less than 1%% efficiency.

LABEL: 0x4608
STRING: Of course, the research didn't go well at all... There was no way it would have.

LABEL: 0x4648
STRING: For a while after that, even though research and development were underway, that 10%% had become a goal that was reduced to a mere facade.

LABEL: 0x471F
STRING: ――That was until Tokiwa developed a new technology.

LABEL: 0x4751
STRING: It was said that the technology she came up with when she was still in elementary school achieved a 12%% energy conversion efficiency.

LABEL: 0x47BF
STRING: An invention so major that the words "great achievement" didn't do it justice.

LABEL: 0x48FF
STRING: 「I might have done something like that.」

LABEL: 0x493A
STRING: Tokiwa, however, made it sound like it was nothing.

LABEL: 0x498B
STRING: 「I did a lot of other things as well.」

LABEL: 0x49C9
STRING: 「From start to finish, I didn't know what kind of research it was.」

LABEL: 0x49FD
STRING: 「I didn't even know what the process or the outcome were.」

LABEL: 0x4A43
STRING: 「So, if parts of it were cut out and I gained a reputation because of it, it's hard to say.」

LABEL: 0x4AEC
STRING: 「I only came up with the idea for artificial photosynthesis in the first place.」

LABEL: 0x4B42
STRING: 「In fact, my father was the one who was able to use it in practice.」

LABEL: 0x4B91
STRING: 「I see...」

LABEL: 0x4BB5
STRING: Still, that didn't change the fact that she was amazing.

LABEL: 0x4BED
STRING: 「You continued researching at ROMLES as well... right?」

LABEL: 0x4C45
STRING: She was praised as a girl genius.

LABEL: 0x4C69
STRING: She was too young to be described as a beauty at the time... but there were still people who were taken in by her well-defined appearance.

LABEL: 0x4CC9
STRING: And then, she had disappeared from the public eye.

LABEL: 0x4D07
STRING: There was no information at all about where she'd been or what she'd been doing up until now.

LABEL: 0x4D4F
STRING: However... she was at ROMLES.

LABEL: 0x4D79
STRING: There, she had been isolated from the rest of the world and had been devotedly doing research for the sake of research...

LABEL: 0x4DD1
STRING: 「What were you doing there?」

LABEL: 0x4E61
STRING: 「The day before yesterday, I saw a dolphin. Yesterday, a whale. And today, you.」

LABEL: 0x4EAC
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x4F2E
STRING: 「I said I was observing whales.」

LABEL: 0x4F67
STRING: Now that she mentioned it, she was awfully knowledgeable about whales and dolphins.

LABEL: 0x4FB3
STRING: Of course, it went without saying that she knew a lot about other creatures as well... but if she specialized in one thing, it would be whales.

LABEL: 0x5038
STRING: 「Whales are very smart.」

LABEL: 0x5062
STRING: 「Do you know how hunchback whales feed?」

LABEL: 0x50AD
STRING: 「No, I don't...」

LABEL: 0x50D3
STRING: Tokiwa began explaining passionately, as if she was enjoying herself.

LABEL: 0x517B
STRING: 「The hunchbacks feed on small fish like herrings and mackerel.」

LABEL: 0x51C5
STRING: 「When they find fish to feed on, they circle around them.」

LABEL: 0x5223
STRING: 「Then, they spit out bubbles while spinning in a circular motion.」

LABEL: 0x52BC
STRING: 「And when they do...」

LABEL: 0x52E7
STRING: 「The small fish, surrounded by bubbles and unable to escape, gather in the center of the circle.」

LABEL: 0x5341
STRING: 「After that, another hunchback will open its mouth and surface from directly below the circle, eating the fish all at once.」

LABEL: 0x5412
STRING: 「That's what's called "bubble-net feeding."」

LABEL: 0x5457
STRING: 「Bubble-net...」

LABEL: 0x5479
STRING: A net of bubbles.

LABEL: 0x548F
STRING: The more I heard, the simpler it sounded.

LABEL: 0x54CD
STRING: However, when one thought of the precision and coordination required to release bubbles with such density that it could be called a "net,"

LABEL: 0x5525
STRING: it was clear that it was no easy feat.

LABEL: 0x5570
STRING: 「In bubble-net feeding, timing is the most important part.」

LABEL: 0x55B2
STRING: 「The whales use their cries to skillfully communicate with each other.」

LABEL: 0x55EE
STRING: 「I spent as much time as I could studying their habits.」

LABEL: 0x563B
STRING: Whales... were amazing.

LABEL: 0x565D
STRING: I was honestly impressed.

LABEL: 0x567B
STRING: It wasn't because of the rough image of their huge bodies, but the way they emphasized individual coordination.

LABEL: 0x56D5
STRING: It looked like there was a lot to learn.

LABEL: 0x5703
STRING: 「There have been a lot of anti-whaling movements for a long time.」

LABEL: 0x574D
STRING: 「If they're that smart, then I guess it's no wonder...」

LABEL: 0x5805
STRING: 「Well, who knows.」

LABEL: 0x5830
STRING: Tokiwa looked down at the now-lightless flask.

LABEL: 0x58DA
STRING: 「I don't agree with the idea that intelligence determines the worth of a creature,

LABEL: 0x5928
STRING: but I guess we humans can't prove our superiority unless we think that way.」

LABEL: 0x5977
STRING: 「What do you mean?」

LABEL: 0x5A05
STRING: 「The reason why whales, dolphins, and monkeys can't be killed indiscriminately,

LABEL: 0x5A43
STRING: is because they have intelligence similar to that of human beings. That's the logic.」

LABEL: 0x5A95
STRING: 「If it was alright to kill them,

LABEL: 0x5ACD
STRING: then it would also be alright to kill people who are less intelligent than you.」

LABEL: 0x5B28
STRING: If they possessed inferior intelligence, it was all right to kill them...?

LABEL: 0x5B58
STRING: I wouldn't go that far.

LABEL: 0x5B8C
STRING: Fundamentalism was a good thing, too.

LABEL: 0x5BB2
STRING: 「Don't you think that's a little too extreme?」

LABEL: 0x5C5E
STRING: 「It may be extreme, but unfortunately, that's all there is to it.」

LABEL: 0x5CAA
STRING: 「The logic to see whales as special...」

LABEL: 0x5CDE
STRING: 「...You also said that "it's no wonder," Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x5D3B
STRING: I couldn't reply.

LABEL: 0x5D5D
STRING: No matter what I said, it was useless.

LABEL: 0x5D7F
STRING: All I could do now was listen to the flow of her voice and thoughts.

LABEL: 0x5DD2
STRING: 「"Intelligence"――」

LABEL: 0x5DF0
STRING: 「Even that's just one of the optimal strategies to improve environmental adaptation.」

LABEL: 0x5E46
STRING: 「Depending on the situation, intelligence may not be adaptable.」

LABEL: 0x5E89
STRING: The smarter you were, the more mistakes you made...

LABEL: 0x5EB1
STRING: That was the same as what Reiri had told me.

LABEL: 0x5EE3
STRING: Rats and levers.

LABEL: 0x5F03
STRING: A question where it was correct to answer without thinking.

LABEL: 0x5FA3
STRING: 「But the truth is...」

LABEL: 0x5FC5
STRING: 「The real truth――」

LABEL: 0x6003
STRING: 「――Is that living beings are precious simply because they're alive.」

LABEL: 0x6040
STRING: ...Tokiwa loved all living beings equally.

LABEL: 0x6076
STRING: Her profound belief was that the lives of deep-sea fish and human beings were equal.

LABEL: 0x60BA
STRING: I thought she held some unknown sense of values,

LABEL: 0x60F2
STRING: but now I felt I understood the true meaning of Tokiwa's love for life.

LABEL: 0x6274
STRING: I couldn't help but engage in conversation with her.

LABEL: 0x629E
STRING: Our original goal was to retrieve the food.

LABEL: 0x62CA
STRING: Yukari and the others were probably worried about us by now.

LABEL: 0x6308
STRING: We couldn't use the radio or anything, so it was impossible for them to know what was going on.

LABEL: 0x6368
STRING: 「Are we ready to leave now?」

LABEL: 0x6402
STRING: 「Well, there's a high probability you're right.」

LABEL: 0x6443
STRING: I slowly opened the door and stepped outside.

LABEL: 0x64FB
STRING: A few seconds after I stepped out into the hallway with Tokiwa in tow...

LABEL: 0x652D
STRING: 「Shit...!」

LABEL: 0x65B7
STRING: 「Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0x65D8
STRING: 「Over there...」

LABEL: 0x6679
STRING: We had barely left the room, and...

LABEL: 0x66A5
STRING: We found a green light flickering on the other side.

LABEL: 0x66E7
STRING: The light wavered in the air as it slowly made its way toward us.

LABEL: 0x6737
STRING: ...What could we do about this?

LABEL: 0x675F
STRING: I guess running was our only option...

LABEL: 0x6789
STRING: 「――If it's come to this...!」

LABEL: 0x681A
STRING: I dashed back to the lab.

LABEL: 0x684C
STRING: I opened the door, entered inside, and immediately went to the side.

LABEL: 0x6878
STRING: I grabbed a nearby bookstand from the desk and returned to the hallway.

LABEL: 0x6932
STRING: 「Katagiri-san!」

LABEL: 0x6953
STRING: 「Hold on, I'll do something about it.」

LABEL: 0x6981
STRING: I rotated my shoulders and raised my bookstand.

LABEL: 0x69B5
STRING: There was no telling if the physical impact would be fatal, but...

LABEL: 0x69EF
STRING: If I threw this at it with all my might, there should be some damage.

LABEL: 0x6A9D
STRING: 「Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x6AB9
STRING: 「What are you doing?」

LABEL: 0x6AE8
STRING: 「What? I'm going to defeat it!」

LABEL: 0x6B32
STRING: I brandished the bookstand.

LABEL: 0x6B62
STRING: I tried to throw it at the light with all my might and...

LABEL: 0x6BF3
STRING: A sudden weight on my arms made me fall down.

LABEL: 0x6C25
STRING: 「Tokiwa!! What are you doing!?」

LABEL: 0x6CB4
STRING: When I turned around, Tokiwa was holding the book stand behind me.

LABEL: 0x6CFA
STRING: With trembling hands and trembling eyes.

LABEL: 0x6D20
STRING: She stared at me with a grim expression.

LABEL: 0x6D61
STRING: 「Don't!」

LABEL: 0x6D82
STRING: 「Why?!」

LABEL: 0x6DAB
STRING: 「That light is alive!」

LABEL: 0x6DD3
STRING: 「You can't kill it for no reason!」
